headline: Northern Ireland Women secure second spot in group
summary: Northern Ireland beat Bosnia and Herzegovina 2-0 at Windsor Park to finish second in their UEFA Women’s EURO 2025 Qualifying Group. Already in the play-offs, the Irish could now be seeded for the first round […]

headline: Scotland Women win group decider against Serbia
summary: Scotland edged Serbia 1-0 in their UEFA Women’s EURO 2025 Qualifying Group decider, to step back up to League A. Kirsty Smith hit the crossbar from outside the box, before Scotland went ahead six minutes […]

headline: Fishlock breaks goalscoring record as Wales Women top table
summary: Wales beat Kosovo 2-0 in Llanelli to top their UEFA Women’s EURO 2025 Qualifying group and go back up to League A. Jess Fishlock took just eight minutes of the game to overtake Helen Ward […]

headline: Republic of Ireland Women overcome France in Cork
summary: Republic of Ireland ended their UEFA Women’s Euro 2025 qualifying group games by taking their first points in a fine 3-1 victory over France. Denise O’Sullivan made the breakthrough in the 66th minute in front […]

headline: England Women going to Euros after goalless game in Sweden
summary: A game of two halves but no goals in Sweden was enough for England to seal their qualification for UEFA Women’s EURO 2025. The Lionesses had much more of the play in the first half […]

headline: Spurs Womens sign England youth international Ella Morris
summary: Tottenham Hotspur sign 21-year-old defender Ella Morris on a three-year deal following her departure from Southampton. Morris helped Southampton win promotion to the Championship and played well over 100 times for the Saints, scoring 14 […]

headline: Chelsea Women sign Oriane Jean-Francois from PSG
summary: Chelsea have signed French international midfielder Oriane Jean-Francois from Paris Saint-Germain on a three-year contract. The 22-year-old played nearly 100 times for PSG with whom she won the Coupe de France, while internationally she worked […]

headline: Republic of Ireland Women U-19s hold European champions
summary: Republic of Ireland held on against a dominant Spain to draw 0-0 in their opening match at the UEFA Women’s U-19 Euros. Katie Keane made a flying save to keep out a hooked effort by […]
